p: Fig 5 and Table 1 together illustrate the changes in the area used for wheat cultivation. From 1970 to 2014, the area used for wheat cultivation gradually increased. It peaked at 5,406.70 10 3 ha, while the minimum value was 3,639.90 10 3 ha. The difference between the maximum and the minimum was not substantial, which indicates that the fluctuation was not significant.
